resources.string: Almighty has also given special children to the society. These children need to be given special education and training to help them become independent and live with self-respect and dignity. \u0020
With the noble objective of creating suitable environment for development, education and training , Shri Dhirubhai Patel established Mangalmurti Viklang Trust in year 1988. \u0020
Following the idea behind these lines of Saint Narsi Mehta, the institute’s objective have been defined. These are : \u0020
1. To establish, run and maintain special school, hostel, workshop and therapy centres for mentally challenged persons. \u0020
2. To make efforts towards making the mentally challenged persons independent in social and financial areas. \u0020

In the lap of the holy mountain Girnar, the city Junagadh of Saint Narsi Mehta, in 5 acre agricultural land, Mangalmurti School started in a grass hut on the auspicious ‘Children’s Day’ in year 1990. \u0020
This institute Mangalmurti proves its name as all the children are “Mangalmurti”, all caretakers, employees are also undoubtedly “Mangalmurti”. \u0020
It is a “Karmateertha” of devoted and committed people working here. \u0020
